articles.description: Sarah Ferguson, 61, posted a video on her YouTube channel the same day daughter Princess Eugenie, 30 and Jack Brooksbank welcomed their baby boy.
articles.content:
The Duchess of York has been seen for the first time since her grandson was welcomed into the world on Tuesday.
Sarah Ferguson, 61, commonly known as Fergie, made her appearance in a video which she… [+4919 chars]
